intro: Yinshania rivulorum, commonly known as the stream yinshania, is a flowering plant native to specific regions in Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Yinshania rivulorum thrives in moist, shaded environments near streams or in forest understories. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and horticultural study.
